title: 104_hr1024
content: The text amends various sections of different titles in the United States Code by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with different committees such as the "Committee on Rules and Administration of the House of Representatives" and the "Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives". The text amends sections of the United States Code by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in various acts and titles. The text amends sections of the United States Code by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in various acts and titles. Amendments are made to Title 40 and Title 44, including redesignating paragraphs and updating the table of chapters. The text amends sections of the United States Code by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in various acts and titles. Amendments are made to Title 40 and Title 44, including redesignating paragraphs and updating the table of chapters. In one instance, an appeal process is changed to be made under subchapter III of chapter 71 of title 5. The text amends sections of the United States Code by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in various acts and titles. Amendments are made to Title 44, including updating sections 312, 502, 504, 505, and 508 by removing references to the Joint Committee on Printing. Amendments to Title 44 of the United States Code replace references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in various sections. This includes changes to sections 508, 509, and 510, updating the roles and entities involved in printing oversight. Amendments to Title 44 of the United States Code replace references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in various sections, including sections 511 and 512. Section 513 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to replace references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" in the applicable fixed standard of quality. Section 514 of title 44, United States Code is amended to replace references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer" for decision-making. Section 515 is also amended to remove reporting defaults to the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 517 of title 44, United States Code is amended to replace the authority of the Joint Committee on Printing with that of the Public Printer. Section 702 and 703 are also amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer. Section 707 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to replace the authority of the Joint Committee on Printing with that of the Public Printer. The Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives, may print bills or resolutions in a suitable style for efficiency until final enactment in Congress. Section 709 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to replace the authority of the Joint Committee on Printing with that of the Public Printer. Section 714 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to give the Public Printer authority to establish rules in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 717 is also amended to replace the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer in consultation with Senate and House officials. Section 718 and 721(a) of title 44, United States Code, are amended to replace the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 722 of title 44, United States Code, is amended by removing the direction of the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 723 is also amended to replace the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 724 of title 44, United States Code, is amended by replacing "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer". Section 728 is also amended to replace "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the House of Representatives". Section 738 and Section 901 of title 44, United States Code, are amended to replace "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives". Section 902, 903, and 905 of title 44, United States Code, are amended to replace "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer, in consultation with the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate, the Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives, the Secretary of the Senate, and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives". Section 905 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to replace "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives". Section 906 is also amended to send copies to the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate and the Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives. The amendment replaces the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives." It also amends the distribution of copies to the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate and the Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives. The amendment replaces the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives." It also amends the distribution of copies to the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate and the Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives by specifying the style and manner of binding copies. Section 1108, 1112, and 1121 of title 44, United States Code, are amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer. Section 1301, 1320A, 1333, and 1338 of title 44, United States Code, are amended by removing references to the Joint Committee on Printing and replacing them with the Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 1338 of title 44, United States Code is amended to remove references to the Joint Committee on Printing and replace them with the Public Printer. Section 1705 of title 44 is also amended to remove regulation by the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 1710, 1914, and 5(b) of title 44, United States Code are amended to remove references to the Joint Committee on Printing. The Act and its amendments will take effect on the first day of the 9th month after enactment, except as specifically provided.
